lead_paragraph: Adele Sarno, a longtime resident who is Italian-American, must leave her apartment in Manhattan’s Little Italy by June 30. Housing advocates say the eviction is betraying the museum’s cultural mission.

headline.print_headline: Museum Gives a Tenant More Time to Move
headline.main: Italian American Museum Gives a Tenant More Time to Move

snippet: Adele Sarno, a longtime resident who is Italian-American, must leave her apartment in Manhattan’s Little Italy by June 30. Housing advocates say the eviction is betraying the museum’s cultural mission.
abstract: Italian American Museum agrees to give 85-year-old Adele Sarno until June 30 to leave her apartment in Manhattan's Little Italy, where she has lived since 1960s; announcement comes after pending eviction is denounced by housing advocates.
